thread.title: Chicago Cubs-New York Mets in NLCS Game 2: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: Chicago Cubs-New York Mets in NLCS Game 2: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Chicago Cubs-New York Mets in NLCS Game 2: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
The Chicago Cubs and New York Mets are getting set to resume the best-of-seven National League Championship Series with Sunday's Game 2 in New York.
Here are the details:
What : Chicago Cubs at New York Mets in NLCS Game 2. Mets lead series 1-0.
Where : Citi Field, New York
When : Sunday, October 18, at 5:07 p.m. PT/8:07 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on TBS, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online live stream : Watch online at WatchTBS or listen at ESPNRadio.com
Live updates : Follow along in the comments section below for live updates during the game
Pitching matchup : Chicago's Jake Arrieta vs. New York's Noah Syndergaard
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
